quotes.author: Noam Chomsky
quotes.quote: In many respects, the United States is a great country. Freedom of speech is protected more than in any other country. It is also a very free society.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quotes.quote: Science investigates religion interprets. Science gives man knowledge which is power religion gives man wisdom which is control.

quotes.author: Victor Borge
quotes.quote: My father invented a cure for which there was no disease and unfortunately my mother caught it and died of it.

quotes.author: Frank Luntz
quotes.quote: Ideology and communication more often than not run into each other rather than complement each other. Principle and communication work together. Ideology and communication often work apart.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.

quotes.author: Bell Hooks
quotes.quote: When we drop fear, we can draw nearer to people, we can draw nearer to the earth, we can draw nearer to all the heavenly creatures that surround us.

quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht
quotes.quote: Do not fear death so much but rather the inadequate life.

quotes.author: Diane Kruger
quotes.quote: Yeah, to me, acting is very therapeutic. I get out a lot of anger and frustration.

quotes.author: William Shatner
quotes.quote: We live in grief for having left the womb, for having left the teat, then school, then home. In my case, it was leaving marriages, and the death of my wife.

quotes.author: James A. Baldwin
quotes.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
